body:
### What it is

An open source collection of functions, building on the basic features of JS, that enables writing of **clear**, **concise** and **expressive** code. Among the superpowers that sinful introduces, some are well-known:

* Currying
* Composition
* Automatic, unobtrusive memoization
* ...

And some are new findings that have proven to be beautiful:

* Liberation
* Enslavement
* Flipped composition
* ...

Check out the [API](https://github.com/guipn/sinful.js/wiki/API) section of the project wiki for a comprehensive listing and the relevant descriptions.



### Requirements

A working [ES5](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-262.htm) environment.



### How to contribute

We're always looking for ways to improve. Here are a few ways in which you can help:

* Open [issues](https://github.com/guipn/sinful.js/issues) on the project's main page
* Spread the word about sinful and get involved in our discussions
* Fork, commit & push



### Contact us

 You can usually find us on Freenode's ##javascript. If that's not an option, you can reach our mailboxes through github.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
